poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: The morgues are full The air-con's out Go park it where your mouth is. The maws are stuffed The malls - sold out; Go park it. You know? The morn's morn You'll no can tell What mobile mob's be-viralled The keywords of Your goggle search; Cats, dolls, should I go on? Modal arguments (Aye, right). A bull careers, a grizzly Mauls; such turmoil In the markets. So park it.
